section.heading: All New Vehicles.
section.text: All classes of new motor vehicles produced by either domestic or foreign manufacturers presented for titling in Maryland shall conform to 49 CFR 565, as amended.

section.heading: Other Vehicles.
section.text: All other vehicles to be titled in this State shall be accompanied by proof of the identity of the vehicle that the Motor Vehicle Administration reasonably requires.

annotations.annotation: Transportation Article, §12-104(B), Annotated Code of Maryland; 49 CFR 565
